module.name: Announcements
module.changelog: *13.0.4* Slideout rnav *13.0.3* Adjust columns to be more meaningful. Show description and destination *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha4* FREEPBX-9495 Cannot Delete Announcement *13.0.1alpha3* Overall fixes and tweaks *13.0.1alpha2* Fix popovers *13.0.1alpha1* Complete reskin *2.11.0.4* Generate license file *2.11.0.1* Using last_id() function (if available) for database calls *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.2* #5883 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.2* #4683 *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* #4655 *2.8.0.0* published 2.8 version *2.7.0.0* spelling fixes, localization updates *2.6.0.2* #3829 *2.6.0.1* #3804 *2.6.0.0* localizations, misc *2.5.1.7* localization string enclosures, spelling *2.5.1.6* spelling, localization fixes *2.5.1.5* spelling fixes, Swedish *2.5.1.4* #3196 typo in index *2.5.1.3* #3195, localization fixes, Swedish *2.5.1.2* #3138 Sqlite3 fixes, spellings *2.5.1.1* #2987 sqlite3 install script changes *2.5.1* #2063 Migrate recordings to recording ids *2.5.0* #2845 tabindex *2.4.0.3* #2872 mispelled Announcement *2.4.0.2* #2604, #2843 mal-formed html tag, Russian translations *2.4.0.1* added 2.4.0 dependency *2.4.0* CHANGELOG TRUNCATED See SVN Repository
module.description: Plays back one of the system recordings (optionally allowing the user to skip it) and then goes to another destination.
